akas: Happy Holidays with Uncle Kopatz (original title)
Chag Sameach Im Dod Kopatz Israel (Hebrew title)
Happy Holidays with Uncle Kopatz World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Happy Holidays with Uncle Kopatz (original title)
Chag Sameach Im Dod Kopatz Israel (Hebrew title)
Happy Holidays with Uncle Kopatz World-wide (English title)
imdb.plot outline: A series with Gil Kopatz about Israeli holidays, where he attempts to create an atmosphere and experience of holiday spirit for today's Internet addicted children. Uncle Kopatz is the 'cool uncle' who takes his nephew and niece on a journey to experience and learn about Israel's holidays together. The ten-year-old kids are used to seeing the world through the computer screen, only learning via the Internet, but all that changes when Uncle Kopatz convinces them to experience the traditions through their hands, feet, and senses, regardless of their resistance.
imdb.title: Happy Holidays with Uncle Kopatz
